refnamediv.refpurpose: Description of the grid layout options set of properties.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: layout_options = createLayoutOptions("grid") layout_options = createLayoutOptions("grid", size) layout_options = createLayoutOptions("grid", size, padding)

listitem.para: [width, heigth] a 1-by-2 matrix of double, [0,0] by default
The width and heigth of the grid in number of elements (not pixels).
A value of 0 for either width or heigth defines an indefinite number of elements on the rows or columns of the grid.
[pad_x, pad_y] a 1-by-2 matrix of doubles, [0,0] by default.
The padding between elements of the grid in pixels.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This functions creates the grid layout options to set uicontrols layout_options attribute.
